item.title: CVE-2024-43165|2024-08-13T11:42:50.880Z -- rashid87 -- wpsection
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Rashid87 WPSection allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects WPSection: from n/a through 1.3.8.
